entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
